sen.j: 君子内親王（くんしないしんのう、生年未詳 - 延喜2年10月8日 (旧暦)（902年11月10日））は、平安時代の皇族・皇女。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Kunshi (date of birth unknown - November 10, 902) was the Imperial princess from the Imperial family in the Heian period.
Imperial Princess Kunshi (date of birth unknown - November 10, 902) was an Imperial princess from the Imperial family during the Heian period.
Imperial Princess Kunshi (date of birth unknown - November 15, 902) was a princess from the Imperial Family during the Heian period.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に修正しました。

sen.j: 父親は宇多天皇（源定省）、母親は宇多天皇の女御・橘義子。
sen.e: Her father was Emperor Uda (MINAMOTO no Sadami) and her mother was TACHIBANA no Yoshiko, who was nyogo (a high-ranking lady in the court (a consort of an emperor)) of Emperor Uda.
Her father was Emperor Uda (MINAMOTO no Sadami) and her mother was TACHIBANA no Yoshiko, who was nyogo (a high-ranking lady in the court - a consort of an emperor) of Emperor Uda.
Her father was Emperor Uda (MINAMOTO no Sadami) and her mother was TACHIBANA no Yoshiko, who was nyogo (a high-ranking lady in the court - a consort of an emperor) of Emperor Uda.

sen.j: 賀茂神社の斎院となった。
sen.e: She became Saiin (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines) of Kamo-jinja Shrine.
She became Saiin (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines) of Kamo-jinja Shrine.
She became Saiin (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines) of Kamo-jinja Shrine.
Biography
Biography
Biography

sen.j: 宇多天皇の第四皇女として生まれる。
sen.e: She was born as the fourth Princess of Emperor Uda.
She was born as the fourth Princess of Emperor Uda.
She was born as the fourth Princess of Emperor Uda.

sen.j: 893年（寛平5年）に賀茂神社（賀茂別雷神社・賀茂御祖神社）で祭祀を取り仕切る斎院となる。
sen.e: In 893, she became Saiin, who manages religious services held at Kamo-jinja Shrines (i.e., Kamowakeikazuchi-jinja Shrine and Kamomioya-jinja Shrine).
In 893, she became Saiin, who manages religious services held at Kamo-jinja Shrines (i.e., Kamowakeikazuchi-jinja Shrine and Kamomioya-jinja Shrine).
In 893, she became Saiin, who manages religious services held at Kamo-jinja Shrines (i.e., Kamowakeikazuchi-jinja Shrine and Kamomioya-jinja Shrine).

sen.j: この斎院職は、902年（延喜2年）まで務めた。
sen.e: She served as Saiin until 902.
She served as Saiin until 902.
She served as Saiin until 902.
She died the same year.
She died the same year.
She died the same year.
